Articles.Content:
Hello,

i'm back on ksp, 

i have old saves from ksp 0.19, ksp 0.22 and ksp 0.23

i have also more recent ones, like 1.2,

i have merged vessels and kerbals in my 1.3.1 save, and it works, but 0.x saves are much older,

it is possible to recover something out of these saves ?

i had some mods, like H.O.M.E, and i can't find it now, seems outdated

thanks.

Edited June 2, 2018 by lk77

IIRC, almost every update in from the alpha and beta stages (<1.0) broke old saves, so those are not usable anymore.  If you really really really wanted to, you might be able to pull out ships one at a time, line by line, from the old files and try to recereate them in the new files, but you'd have to add and remove a lot of stuff, and it'd just be way easier (and safer) to build a new vessel in the VAB and edit it into place. 

For old mods, if the mod maker hasn't updated the mod, you have two options, you can go without, or take over the mod and update it yourself.
